forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers developing this afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High near 65F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 14C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 56F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
